== Harwada (603324) ==
      
Harwada is a village in the [[Ankola ]] taluka of [[Uttara Kannada]] district with an area of 612.13 hectares and harbouring 1094 households with total population of 4362 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[ANKOLA]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 2137 and female population is 2225. Scheduled Caste Population is 108 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3. Census Location Code of the village is 603324<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
